headline: CEO at Jack & Transfez
summary: Graduated from Institut Teknologi Bandung, majoring in Industrial Engineering, Edo is a serial entrepreneur with more than 10 years of experience in founding companies from various industries such as mining, export-import, and e-commerce. He also has extensive experience in advising business owners and senior management in his previous role as a partner in his consulting firm, dealing with local & global clients partners as well as government institutions. He is now building Transfez (YC W22) with a mission to make cross-border finance simpler for everyone.

experiences.title: Chief Executive Officer
experiences.description:
- Launched a pioneering fintech startup that's transforming Indonesia's payment landscape (itsjack.com)
- Strategically positioned the company for rapid expansion in the Indonesian market

experiences.title: Chief Executive Officer
experiences.description: Cross-border payment, money transfer & network solutions for individuals and SMEs (transfez.com)

experiences.title: GTI Consulting
experiences.description:
- Founded a high-impact consulting firm, serving government entities, private corporations, and banks.
- Led transformative projects, such as a $2M annual cost-saving system and pivotal digitalization initiatives.

experiences.title: Founder & CEO
experiences.description:
- Built and led a manganese ore mining company, managing 1000 hectares of concession, to become one of the leading producers and exporters to China.
- Achieved a strategic exit, cementing its legacy as a remarkable entrepreneurial success.

experiences.title: People Management Specialist
experiences.description:
- Led in-depth analyses to identify competency gaps within the organization, comparing current employee skill sets with ideal competencies required for optimal performance.
- Developed and implemented tailored development plans to bridge identified gaps, enhancing both soft skills (communication, leadership, teamwork) and technical proficiencies specific to roles, especially for engineers.
- Continuously tracked and reported on the progress of competency development initiatives, achieving measurable improvements in employee performance, engagement, and retention.

experiences.title: Process Improvement Specialist, Operational Excellence Team
experiences.description:
- Spearheaded the implementation of lean manufacturing and Six Sigma methodologies, identifying inefficiencies and redundancies in banking processes.
- Redesigned end-to-end workflow processes, achieving significant reductions in processing times, effort, and associated costs.
- Led kaizen events and continuous improvement initiatives that fostered a culture of operational excellence within the organization.
